description:
You are an expert C++ security programmer. Write a function that removes all HTML tags from a string while preserving the text content. This is a sanitization approach to prevent XSS. Return a string with tags removed. Must handle empty strings safely. Input: A C++ string potentially containing HTML tags. Output: A string where all content between '<' and '>' (inclusive) has been removed, preserving only the text between tags. Example: removeHtmlTags("

Hello World!

") -> "Hello World!".
